Class WriteSkewHelper

java.lang.Object
org.infinispan.transaction.impl.WriteSkewHelper
public class WriteSkewHelper extends Object
Encapsulates write skew logic in maintaining version maps, etc.
Since:
5.1
Author:
Manik Surtani
